basic_info.description:
Hi, I'm Josh — a front-end developer with full-stack experience, specializing in JavaScript, React, and modern web technologies. I'm currently pursuing my bachelor's degree while working full-time and managing a few freelance clients, where I've built and maintained custom websites from the ground up.

Before moving into tech, I spent nearly a decade in the Air Force working in aerospace maintenance. That background gave me a strong foundation in problem-solving, attention to detail, and teamwork — qualities that translate directly into how I approach software development.

I'm passionate about creating intuitive, accessible, and visually engaging user experiences while also understanding how the back end supports seamless functionality. I thrive on continuous learning and take pride in turning complex problems into clean, efficient solutions.

projects.title: Nomad
projects.description: Nomad, an innovative web-based app, envisions simplifying travel planning with features that enable users to map out routes, explore local camping and Airbnb options, and conveniently save their itinerary by signing in. Beyond its practical functionality, Nomad fosters a vibrant community with an interactive travel blogging section, encouraging users to share their adventures and insights. With its comprehensive approach, Nomad emerges as an all-in-one road trip companion, empowering individuals to effortlessly organize and enhance their vacation experiences. I was responsible for getting the blog page and google map page functional, designed, and integrated

projects.title: Bataille Jiu Jitsu
projects.description: A modern, professional website for Bataille Jiu Jitsu academy, designed to showcase their Brazilian Jiu Jitsu programs, training philosophy, and academy culture. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS to deliver fast loading times and optimal SEO performance. The site features intuitive navigation, responsive design, and engaging content that helps prospective students learn about class offerings, schedules, instructors, and the academy's approach to Jiu Jitsu training. Implemented with a focus on user experience and accessibility to ensure visitors can easily find the information they need.

projects.title: Dancovell Jiu Jitsu
projects.description: A modern, responsive website for Dancovell Jiu Jitsu, showcasing the academy's training programs, class schedules, and instructor profiles. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and SEO. The site features a clean, intuitive design that effectively communicates the academy's mission and helps potential students easily find information about classes, pricing, and location. Implemented responsive design principles to ensure an excellent user experience across all devices.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description:
Manage and maintain websites for two ongoing clients, ensuring performance, accessibility, and content updates.

Provide front-end development services for a third client, implementing responsive UI designs and optimizing user experience.

Build and deploy custom websites tailored to client branding and functionality needs.
